text: Leucadendron discolor is a species of plant in the family Proteaceae. It is endemic to South Africa. It is threatened by habitat loss. In English the plant is known as the Piketberg Conebush and in Afrikaans as the Rooitolbos. ==References== ==External links== discolor Category:Endemic flora of South Africa Category:Flora of the Cape Provinces Category:Fynbos Category:Endangered flora of Africa Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Leucadendron discolor
